tooltip.vherbalism.birch_sap.tooltip: Helps soothe and treat Yellowcough when eaten.
tooltip.vherbalism.bindweed.tooltip: Helps promote healing in broken bones when placed within a splint.
tooltip.vherbalism.borage.tooltip: Dampens fevers, helps with stomach pain and tight chests when eaten.
tooltip.vherbalism.broom.tooltip: Can be mashed into Broom Poultice.
tooltip.vherbalism.broom_poultice.toolti: Helps promote healing in broken bones and wounds when applied to/ around the affected area.
tooltip.vherbalism.burdock_root.tooltip: Soothes sores, bites, and other minor afflictions when chewed and applied to affected areas.
tooltip.vherbalism.blackberry_leaves.too: Can be mashed into Blackberry Leaf Poultice.
tooltip.vherbalism.blackberry_poultice.t: Helps soothe the pain of bee stings when applied to the affected area.
tooltip.vherbalism.burnet.tooltip: Can be chewed for strength when traveling.
tooltip.vherbalism.catchweed.tooltip: Used in poultices to prevent them from being easily rubbed off from the skin.
tooltip.vherbalism.celadine.tooltip: Can be mashed into Celadine Juice.
tooltip.vherbalism.celadine_juice.toolti: Can be dripped into damaged/ injured eyes to help with healing.
tooltip.vherbalism.camomile.tooltip: Can be chewed for strength when traveling.
tooltip.vherbalism.cobweb.tooltip: Can be used in poultices or directly on wounds to help seal them.
tooltip.vherbalism.chervil.tooltip: Can soothe infections or bellyaches when chewed.
